name: Barrel Roll The Dice!
description:
A submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2022 made in Godot

BARREL ROLL THE DICE!

Welcome to the Space Orca Foundation! Where we shoot Dice shaped space ships! Your goal cannot be more simple: SHOOT THE DICE. When one enters your crosshair... you shoot it... SIMPLE! So please don't mess up!

---Assets used---

icons : https://kenney.nl/assets

shaders:

Health Circle https://godotshaders.com/shader/health-circle/

Enemy Beams https://godotshaders.com/shader/energy-beams/

Nebula Background https://godotshaders.com/shader/2d-nebula-shader/

Sprite Explosion https://github.com/PlayWithFurcifer/ExplodeSprite

plugins:

Dialogic https://dialogic.coppolaemilio.com/

Random Audio Stream Player https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/651
